title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log in to their account. They've tried resetting their password multiple times but still can't access it.

title: Payment Not Processing
description: User is receiving an error message every time they try to complete a purchase. The payment method seems valid.

title: Bug Report: Filter Functionality
description: The filter on the product page is not working correctly. It shows an empty list even when there are matching items.

title: Account Deactivation Request
description: Customer wants to have their account permanently deleted from the system due to privacy concerns.

title: Missing Order Confirmation Email
description: User completed an order but never received a confirmation email. The order appears as 'pending' in their history.

title: Website Performance Issue
description: The website is loading very slowly, especially on mobile devices. Pages are taking over 5 seconds to load.

title: Password Reset Link Expired
description: A user reported that the password reset link they received expired instantly and they couldn't use it.

title: Feature Request: Dark Mode
description: Customer has requested a dark mode option for the application to reduce eye strain during nighttime use.

title: Subscription Cancellation Error
description: User is unable to cancel their subscription. The 'cancel' button is unresponsive, and they're still being charged.

title: Incorrect Product Information
description: The dimensions listed for a specific product are incorrect, causing confusion for customers.

title: UI Glitch on Dashboard
description: The charts on the user dashboard are overlapping and not displaying correctly on smaller screen sizes.

title: Unable to Upload Profile Picture
description: Users are encountering an error message every time they try to upload a new profile picture to their account.

title: General Inquiry about Services
description: A potential customer has questions about the different pricing tiers and features of the service.

title: Mobile App Crashing
description: The mobile application is consistently crashing on launch for users with the latest iOS update.

title: Notification Preferences Not Saving
description: User is reporting that their email and push notification preferences are not saving after they update them.
